articles.author: Alex Kozul-Wright
articles.title: Trump’s India tariffs take effect: Which sector will be hit, what’s exempt? - Al Jazeera
articles.description: A 50 percent tariff on India will impact trade worth billions of dollars and risk Washington-New Delhi ties.
articles.content: United States President Donald Trumps 50 percent tariff on Indian goods, which is expected to impact trade worth billions of dollars and risk thousands of jobs in the worlds most populous nation, too… [+8453 chars]
